description: Adaptive Layout definition for the common properties.

designMode.description: Used internally, to indicate that the component is being rendered in "design mode", in case it needs to behave differently.
designMode.label: Design Mode

className.description: The CSS class to be assigned to this layout component type.
className.label: Class Name

style.description: An object representing the CSS style to be applied to this layout component type.
style.label: Style Properties

id.description: Specifies a unique id for an element.
id.label: Id

title.description: Specifies extra information about an element.
title.label: Title

aria-label.description: This attribute is used to define a string that labels the current element. Use it in cases where a text label is not visible on the screen.
aria-label.label: ARIA Label

aria-labelledby.description: Establishes the relationships between objects and their label(s).
aria-labelledby.label: ARIA Labelled By

role.description: Identifies to parsing software the exact function of an element (and its children) as part of a web application.
role.label: Role
